00026 #ifndef __Win32Window_H__
00027 #define __Win32Window_H__
00028 
00029 #include "OgreWin32Prerequisites.h"
00030 #include "OgreRenderWindow.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033     class Win32Window : public RenderWindow
00034     {
00035     public:
00036         Win32Window(Win32GLSupport &glsupport);
00037         ~Win32Window();
00038 
00039        void create(const String& name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00040                 bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams);
00041         void destroy(void);
00042         bool isVisible() const;
00043         bool isClosed(void) const;
00044         void reposition(int left, int top);
00045         void resize(unsigned int width, unsigned int height);
00046         void swapBuffers(bool waitForVSync);
00047 
00050         void writeContentsToFile(const String& filename);
00051 
00052         bool requiresTextureFlipping() const { return false; }
00053 
00054         HWND getWindowHandle() const { return mHWnd; }
00055         HDC getHDC() const { return mHDC; }
00056         
00057         // Method for dealing with resize / move & 3d library
00058         virtual void windowMovedOrResized(void);
00059         
00060         void getCustomAttribute( const String& name, void* pData );
00061 
00062     protected:
00063         Win32GLSupport &mGLSupport;
00064         HWND    mHWnd;                  // Win32 Window handle
00065         HDC     mHDC;
00066         HGLRC   mGlrc;
00067         bool    mIsExternal;
00068         bool    mSizing;
00069         bool    mClosed;
00070         int     mDisplayFrequency;      // fullscreen only, to restore display
00071         Win32Context *mContext;
00072 
00073         static LRESULT CALLBACK WndProc(HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam);
00074     };
00075 }
